com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.rails.logic

Class RailLogic

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bergerkiller.bukkit.tc.rails.logic.RailLogic
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RailLogicAir, RailLogicGround, RailLogicHorizontal, RailLogicVertical

    public abstract class RailLogic
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles how a minecart travels on top of a rail

      • getDirection

        public org.bukkit.block.BlockFace getDirection()
        Gets the horizontal direction of the rails this logic is for
        Returns:
        horizontal rail direction

      • isSloped

        public boolean isSloped()
        Checks if this type of Rail Logic is for sloped tracks
        Returns:
        True if sloped, False if not

      • hasVerticalMovement

        public boolean hasVerticalMovement()
        Gets whether vertical movement is performed by this rail logic
        Returns:
        True if vertical movement is performed, False if not

      • isUpsideDown

        public boolean isUpsideDown()
        Gets whether the rail logic type makes use of upside-down rail physics. When this return True, passenger damage from blocks above the Minecart are ignored.
        Returns:
        True if upside-down

      • getGravityMultiplier

        public double getGravityMultiplier(MinecartMember<?> member)
        Gets the vertical motion factor caused by gravity. When gravity should be disabled for particular rail logic, it should be done here.
        Returns:
        gravity multiplier

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:

        public void onSpacingUpdate(MinecartMember<?> member,
                            org.bukkit.util.Vector velocity,
                            org.bukkit.util.Vector factor)
        Maintains equal spacing between Minecarts, updates for a single Minecart prior to moving
        Parameters:
        member - to update
        velocity - that is currently set
        factor - that needs applying to ensure correct spacing

        public double getForwardVelocity(MinecartMember<?> member)
        Gets the minecart forward velocity on this type of Rail Logic

        Returns:

        force - to set to, negative to reverse

public org.bukkit.block.BlockFace getMovementDirection(org.bukkit.block.BlockFace endDirection)
        Deprecated. 
        Obtains the direction to which a Minecart is moving on this type of Rail Logic. DEPRECATED: I'm going to move this to RailPath eventually. This is only here to handle special if-this-then-down cases.
        Parameters:
        endDirection - block side the minecart is moving to
        Returns:
        the BlockFace direction

      • onPathAdjust

        public void onPathAdjust(RailState state)
        Callback which allows Rail Logic to alter the movement direction or general positioning of the rail state during path tracking.
        Parameters:
        state -

      • getPath

        public RailPath getPath()
        Obtains a path consisting of connected points along which Minecarts move using this rail logic. The point coordinates are relative to the coordinates of the rails block. This allows the rails path to be cached, since they are unlikely to change.
        Returns:
        rails path

      • onUpdateOrientation

        public void onUpdateOrientation(MinecartMember<?> member,
                                com.bergerkiller.bukkit.common.math.Quaternion orientation)
        Is called right after all physics updates have completed, and the final orientation of the Minecart entity can be adjusted. Before this is called, the orientation is already calculated from the rail path. For most rail logic there is no further need to calculate rotation.

        The setOrientation(o) method can be used to set the orientation of the Minecart in this function. By default this is the only thing that happens, which means calling super.onUpdateOrientation() with the desired orientation is enough.
        Parameters:
        member - to update
        orientation - that is set based on rail path information

      • onPreMove

        public void onPreMove(MinecartMember<?> member)
        Is called right before the minecart will perform the movement updates
        This event is called before the onPostMove event

        Velocity changes and positional fixes that influence the final movement should occur here

        Parameters:
        member - to update

      • onPostMove

        public void onPostMove(MinecartMember<?> member)
        Is called after the minecart performed the movement updates
        This event is called after the onPreMove event

        Final positioning updates and velocity changes for the next tick should occur here

        Parameters:
        member - that moved
